title: Sound On: Rep. Brady, Infrastructure, Taxes (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Rep. Brady, Infrastructure, Taxes (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Republican Texas Congressman Kevin Brady, Bloomberg Congressional reporter Steven Dennis, Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick, and James Lewis, senior vice president and program director at the Center for Strategic and International Studies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
